coreAttributes.authorTag: Along the side of one of the handles, there is a small etching that reads "Black Phillip"
coreAttributes.name: Nunchaku
coreAttributes.description: A widely used weapon in martial arts. It is intended to be used as a training weapon, since practicing with it enables the development of quick hand movements and improves posture.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] the nunchaku out, letting the other end loose.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(fold)] the nunchaku together and [npc.verb(put)] it away.
coreAttributes.onCriticalHitEffect: #IF !npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_DAZED) #THEN [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_DAZED, 6)] [npc2.Name] [npc2.is] [style.boldPhysical(seeing stars)] from such a succession of blows! #ENDIF

hitDescriptions.hitText: Swinging out with [npc.her] nunchaku, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.name] flush in the face. There is a loud cracking sound as the shaft connects with the aura above [npc2.her] head to drain [npc2.her] energy!

With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(swing)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] nunchaku, bashing into the aura around [npc2.her] shoulder with the shaft and causing [npc2.herHim] to lose some energy!

Swinging out with [npc.her] nunchaku, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.name] across the head! There is a loud cracking sound as the shaft connects with the aura above [npc2.her] head to drain [npc2.her] energy!

missDescriptions.missText: Swinging wide with [npc.her] nunchaku, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to hit [npc2.name] in the chest, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(swing)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] nunchaku, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
Swinging out with [npc.her] nunchaku, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to hit [npc2.name] across the head, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
